name: The Resort
description: Four friends head to Hawaii to investigate reports of a haunting at an abandoned resort in hopes of finding the infamous Half-Faced Girl. When they arrive, they soon learn you should be careful what you wish for.

review.author: SnoopyStyle
review.heading: abandoned hotel horror
review.reviewBody:
Four young adult friends go to an abandoned Hawaiian resort hotel complex reportedly haunted by the urban legend Half-Faced Girl.

My guess is that they had this place before writing up a plot. This is not a complicated plot. I could do without the hospital scenes which has the survivor problem. I don't mind the twist but it's not that interesting. I do like the abandoned hotel at night. It's very much like urban exploration. Of course, there is the scene where the hot young bods are frolicking at the waterfall. As a horror, it's rather weak. The filmmaking is poor and the acting is pedestrian.
